name: Pushups
theory: There is no limit to how many push-ups one can do in a day. Many people do more than 300 push-ups a day. But for an average person

name: Dumbbells
theory: Weight lifting with dumbbells lowers your risk of heart attack, stroke, and cardiovascular disease

name: Jogging
theory: Regularly jogging can help you lose weight, especially if you also modify your diet. Jogging can also help you improve your heart health

name: Outdoors
theory: There is no limit to how many push-ups one can do in a day. Many people do more than 300 push-ups a day. But for an average person

name: Workout
theory: Exercise is powerful medicine. Exercise is an important part of a healthy lifestyle. Exercise prevents health problems

name: Cycling
theory: Regular cycling stimulates and improves your heart, lungs and circulation, reducing your risk of cardiovascular diseases.
